message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. Given its high value to you, we are offering it to you at a special price of $1200000. We believe this is a fair offer considering both the quality of the product and its significance to you. We look forward to your consideration.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product and my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we are pleased to counter your offer with a price of $1000000 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value you place on the product while allowing us to achieve a satisfactory return. We hope this proposal will meet your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1000000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $950000. I believe this is a fair price that balances our interests.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. We understand your position and are willing to consider a price of $975000 for the product. We believe this offers a reasonable compromise between respecting the value you see in the product and achieving a satisfactory return for us. We hope this proposal aligns with your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $975000. I'm willing to meet you at $960000. I think this is a fair price that balances our interests and gets me the product I need.

We appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After reviewing our costs and the value you place on the product, we are willing to negotiate at a price of $965000. This price reflects a balance between our needs and your budget. We hope this offer meets your requirements and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $965000. I'm willing to meet you at $955000. I think this is a fair price that gets me the product I need while staying within my budget.

We understand your position, Bob, and after careful consideration, we are willing to negotiate at a price of $960000 for the product. This price represents a fair compromise between our needs and your budget. We hope this offer will help us reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.
